    css: "css/strapless.css"

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-body-outset"}
library(bslib)
library(htmltools)
card(
  card_header(
    class = "bg-dark",
    tags$a("Ongoing SY23_24 Report", href = "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/OngoingReport_23_24/", style = "font-weight:bold;")
  ),
  card_image(file = "Images/Reports/23_24/Ongoing23_24Report.png",
             href = "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/OngoingReport_23_24/"),
  card_body(
    fill = FALSE, gap = 0,
    card_title("A fully compiled, updating, interactive report for all L&R data representing each part of the Guskey Framework", style = "font-size:larger;"),
    tags$a(class = "text-muted", "See the tutorial for usage here", href = "https://www.youtube.com/")
  )
)
```

<br>

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-body-outset"}
card(
  card_header(
    class = "bg-dark",
    tags$a("Report Archives", href = "https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xi_8BgYrYfdVgSSMDF_exQo9AFCs92s5", style = "font-weight:bold;")
  ),
  card_image(file = "Images/Reports/google_drive.png",
             href = "https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xi_8BgYrYfdVgSSMDF_exQo9AFCs92s5"),
  card_body(
    fill = FALSE, gap = 0,
    card_title("All reports from previous years are archived on google drive, please download and launch in your web browswer to view.")
  )
)
```
